roadmap.title: 30-Day Backend Engineer Learning Roadmap
roadmap.description: Comprehensive backend engineering preparation with Theory → Interview Questions → Hands-on approach

days.title: System Design Fundamentals
days.description: Foundation of distributed systems and scalability concepts
deliverables: Understand CAP theorem with real-world examples
Implement a simple load balancer in Node.js/Python

days.title: Database Fundamentals
days.description: SQL vs NoSQL, indexing, and database optimization
deliverables: Create comparison table: SQL vs NoSQL use cases
Optimize a slow query using indexing
Design sharding strategy for a social media app

days.title: Caching & Message Queues
days.description: Redis, Memcached, and async communication patterns
deliverables: Set up Redis for session management
Build a simple message queue system

days.title: API Design & REST
days.description: RESTful principles, API versioning, and best practices
deliverables: Design a RESTful API for a blog platform
Add rate limiting to API endpoints

days.title: Authentication & Authorization
days.description: JWT, OAuth, session management, and security best practices
deliverables: Design RBAC system for multi-tenant app

days.title: Microservices Architecture
days.description: Service decomposition, inter-service communication, and patterns

days.title: Docker & Containerization
days.description: Docker fundamentals, Dockerfile optimization, and orchestration basics

days.title: Kubernetes Basics
days.description: K8s architecture, pods, services, and deployments

days.title: CI/CD Pipelines
days.description: GitHub Actions, Jenkins, automated testing, and deployment

days.title: Monitoring & Observability
days.description: Prometheus, Grafana, logging, and distributed tracing
deliverables: Set up Prometheus for metrics collection

days.title: GraphQL & gRPC
days.description: Modern API protocols beyond REST
deliverables: Compare REST vs GraphQL vs gRPC

dsaProblems.name: Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock

days.title: Security Best Practices
days.description: OWASP Top 10, encryption, and secure coding

days.title: Testing Strategies
days.description: Unit, integration, E2E testing, and TDD

days.title: Event-Driven Architecture
days.description: Event sourcing, CQRS, and async patterns

days.title: Review & Mini Project
days.description: Consolidate Days 1-14 with a comprehensive project
deliverables: Include: Auth, DB, Caching, Message Queue, Docker, CI/CD

days.title: Performance Optimization
days.description: Profiling, bottleneck identification, and optimization techniques

days.title: Search & Indexing
days.description: Elasticsearch, full-text search, and search optimization

days.title: Streaming & Real-time Data
days.description: Kafka Streams, WebSockets, and real-time processing

days.title: Distributed Systems Patterns
days.description: Saga, Circuit Breaker, and resilience patterns
deliverables: Implement Saga pattern for distributed transactions
Build retry mechanism with exponential backoff

days.title: Cloud Platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure)
days.description: Cloud services, serverless, and infrastructure

days.title: Data Modeling & Schema Design
days.description: Database schema design, normalization, and data modeling

days.title: Rate Limiting & Throttling
days.description: API rate limiting strategies and implementation

days.title: Consistency & Consensus
days.description: Raft, Paxos, and distributed consensus

days.title: Logging & Error Handling
days.description: Structured logging, log aggregation, and error tracking
deliverables: Set up ELK stack for log aggregation

days.title: Batch Processing & ETL
days.description: Data pipelines, batch jobs, and ETL workflows

days.title: GraphQL Deep Dive
days.description: Advanced GraphQL patterns, subscriptions, and optimization

days.title: Infrastructure as Code
days.description: Terraform, CloudFormation, and IaC best practices

days.title: API Gateway & Service Mesh
days.description: Kong, Istio, and advanced routing

days.title: System Design Practice
days.description: Design popular systems (URL shortener, Twitter, Netflix)

days.title: Final Review & Capstone Project
days.description: Consolidate all learnings and build comprehensive project
deliverables: Include: Microservices, DB, Caching, Auth, CI/CD, Monitoring
